  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15640</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Webquest sulla cultura turca</string>
            <string language="en">Turkish Culture WebQuest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Türkische Kultur WebQuest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Culture Turque WebQuest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura Turkish WebQuest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τουρκικός πολιτισμός WebQuest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura Turca WebQuest</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Informazioni sulla Turchia e la sua storia: come il Monte Nemrut ha un gran numero di manufatti storici sulla sua vetta, perché Mevlana è importante, la interessante storia e geologia della Cappadocia.</string>
            <string language="en">Information about Turkey and its history:
how Mount Nemrut has lots of historical artifacts at the top of it, 
why Mevlana is that important,
the interesting history and geology of Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationen über die Türkei und seine 
history:how Montierung Nemrut haben Lots historische Kunstprodukte an 
der Oberseite von ihr, warum Mevlana wichtiges das ist, an der 
interessanten Geschichte und an der Geologie von Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les informations sur la Turquie et son support 
Nemrut de history:how ont un bon nombre d'objets façonnés 
historiques au dessus d'elles, pourquoi Mevlana est celui important, 
à l'histoire et à la géologie intéressantes de Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A informação sobre Turquia e sua montagem 
Nemrut de history:how tem lotes de artifacts históricos no alto dela,
porque Mevlana é aquele importante, no history e na geologia 
interessantes de Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι πληροφορίες για την Τουρκία και history:how της 
επικολλούν Nemrut έχουν τα μέρη των ιστορικών χειροποίητων 
αντικειμένων στην κορυφή από το, γιατί Mevlana είναι αυτό 
σημαντικό, η ενδιαφέρουσες ιστορία και η γεωλογία Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La información sobre Turquía y su montaje 
Nemrut de history:how tiene porciones de artefactos históricos en la 
tapa de ella, porqué Mevlana es ése importante, la historia y la 
geología interesantes de Cappadocia.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
